object.name: InlineQueryResultPhoto
object.description: Represents a link to a photo. By default, this photo will be sent by the user with optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the photo.
object.html_description: Represents a link to a photo. By default, this photo will be sent by the user with optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the photo.
object.rst_description: Represents a link to a photo. By default, this photo will be sent by the user with optional caption. Alternatively, you can use *input_message_content* to send a message with the specified content instead of the photo.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be photo
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *photo*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: A valid URL of the photo. Photo must be in JPEG format. Photo size must not exceed 5MB
annotations.html_description: A valid URL of the photo. Photo must be in JPEG format. Photo size must not exceed 5MB
annotations.rst_description: A valid URL of the photo. Photo must be in **JPEG** format. Photo size must not exceed 5MB
annotations.name: photo_url

annotations.description: URL of the thumbnail for the photo
annotations.html_description: URL of the thumbnail for the photo
annotations.rst_description: URL of the thumbnail for the photo
annotations.name: thumbnail_url

annotations.description: Caption of the photo to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: Optional. Caption of the photo to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Caption of the photo to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: caption

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the photo caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the photo caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Mode for parsing entities in the photo caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: Inline keyboard attached to the message
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Content of the message to be sent instead of the photo
annotations.html_description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the photo
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Content of the message to be sent instead of the photo
annotations.name: input_message_content
